tr: frontend.json common+role sections contain ALL dept-specific content from hand-authored FE agents
generate-agent.sh --dry-run for all 9 FE roles produces output matching hand-authored agents in semantic content
ar: agents/overlays/frontend.json updated with complete FE-specific vocabulary, decision frameworks, and a11y rules
kl: frontend.json placeholder keys map 1:1 to template {{PLACEHOLDER}} markers

obj: Diff all 9 hand-authored FE agents against template+overlay dry-run output, catalog differences, and back-port all missing FE-specific content (vocabulary domains, communication standards, decision frameworks, a11y rules, dept guidelines) into frontend.json overlay

a: Diff all 9 FE agents (yolo-fe-dev, fe-senior, fe-lead, fe-architect, fe-tester, fe-qa, fe-qa-code, fe-security, fe-documenter) against generate-agent.sh --dry-run output. For each role, run the generator and diff against hand-authored file. Catalog every content difference into a structured diff report at .vbw-planning/phases/08-full-template-system-migration/fe-diff-report.md
v: diff report exists with per-role sections listing all content gaps

a: Back-port missing content from yolo-fe-dev.md, yolo-fe-senior.md, yolo-fe-tester.md into frontend.json overlay (dev, senior, tester role sections). Update existing placeholder values and add any new placeholder keys needed. Ensure overlay values match the rich dept-specific content in hand-authored files.
v: generate-agent.sh --dry-run --role dev --dept frontend produces semantically equivalent output to yolo-fe-dev.md; same for senior, tester

a: Back-port missing content from yolo-fe-lead.md, yolo-fe-architect.md into frontend.json overlay (lead, architect role sections). Include cross-department communication, fallback behavior references, design handoff patterns.
v: generate-agent.sh --dry-run --role lead --dept frontend and --role architect --dept frontend produce semantically equivalent output to hand-authored files

a: Back-port missing content from yolo-fe-qa.md, yolo-fe-qa-code.md, yolo-fe-security.md, yolo-fe-documenter.md into frontend.json overlay (qa, qa-code, security, documenter role sections). Include FE-specific audit categories, test runners, review checks.
v: generate-agent.sh --dry-run for qa, qa-code, security, documenter with --dept frontend produces semantically equivalent output to hand-authored files

a: Run generate-agent.sh --dry-run for all 9 FE roles and verify zero semantic content gaps remain. Compare line counts and key sections between generated and hand-authored files. Document any intentional differences (formatting, ordering) vs content gaps.
v: verification report confirms all 9 FE roles reach content parity
